dict.acceptation: 著作家；作者；创造者；发起人；

sent.orig: Author Translation Author translation has its own stand-alone line, begins with marker AUTHOR2.
sent.trans: 作者译名或译音作者译名独为一行，由标记AUTHOR2注明。

sent.orig: Author Author has its own stand-alone line, begins with marker AUTHOR1.
sent.trans: 作者作者独为一行，由标记AUTHOR1注明。

sent.orig: Clicking on author name will show all of the titles compiled by the author.
sent.trans: 点击作者的名称便会显示该作者的所有书目。

sent.orig: A author abases the other author competed with him to improve his position.
sent.trans: 一位作家贬低另一位与他有竞争关系的作家，为了提高他的地位。

sent.orig: The author index has entries arranged in alphabetical order of author's surnames.
sent.trans: 著者索引中有按著者姓氏字母顺序排列的著录。
